droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_1
droneBlueprint.title: Combat Drone Mark I
droneBlueprint.desc: Powerful drone that continually attacks the enemy ship.

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_2
droneBlueprint.title: Combat Drone Mark II
droneBlueprint.desc: Powerful drone that continually attacks the enemy ship. Moves and shoots faster than Mark I.

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_BEAM
droneBlueprint.title: Anti-Ship Beam Drone I
droneBlueprint.desc: Combat drone that repeatedly attacks with a small beam weapon

droneBlueprint.name: BATTLE
droneBlueprint.title: Anti-Personnel Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Will seek out and attempt to destroy any intruders on-board your ship.

droneBlueprint.name: BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Boarding Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Breaches through the enemy hull and wreaks havoc. Awesome.

droneBlueprint.name: SPAWN_BATTLE
droneBlueprint.title: Eldritch Spawn
droneBlueprint.desc:
A mysterious creature birthed from the mind of an eldritch power.
    
-Cannot be damaged, stunned or mind controlled. Destroying Drone Control will repel it.

droneBlueprint.name: SPAWN_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Eldritch Spawn
droneBlueprint.desc:
A mysterious creature birthed from the mind of an eldritch power.
    
-Cannot be damaged, stunned or mind controlled. Destroying Drone Control will repel it.

droneBlueprint.name: GANA_BATTLE
droneBlueprint.title: Gana [Shipboard]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Shipboard] A helpful assistant drone created by Archive Inc. Seems to be slightly malfunctioning and constantly complaining about "systems", which is probably why he was given to you.
    
-Deals 1 system damage on first impact with an enemy ship
-2x combat damage, 1.75x movement speed
-Immune to fire and stun
-Can repair and man systems at lvl2 skill level

droneBlueprint.name: GANA_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Gana [Boarder]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] A helpful assistant drone created by Archive Inc. Seems to be slightly malfunctioning and constantly complaining about "systems", which is probably why he was given to you.
    
-Deals 1 system damage on first impact with an enemy ship
-2x combat damage, 1.75x movement speed
-Immune to fire and stun
-Can repair and man systems at lvl2 skill level

droneBlueprint.name: A55_BATTLE
droneBlueprint.title: A5540L3 [Swashbuckler]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Swashbuckling] Pirate captain A5540L3, a cognitive trapped in a mismatched shell who just wants to be free, and maybe be an interdimensional hero too.
    
-150 HP, 1.5x combat damage
-Heals nearby allies for 2hp/s
-Can repair and man systems at lvl2 skill level

droneBlueprint.name: A55_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: A5540L3 [Plunderer]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Plundering] Pirate captain A5540L3, a cognitive trapped in a mismatched shell who just wants to be free, and maybe be an interdimensional hero too.
    
-150 HP, 1.5x combat damage
-Heals nearby allies for 2hp/s
-Can repair and man systems at lvl2 skill level

droneBlueprint.name: DEFENSE_PRIME
droneBlueprint.title: Arch-Angel
droneBlueprint.desc:
Defense drone capable of targeting lasers, solid projectiles and other hostile drones.
	Reload: 50 MS

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_PRIME
droneBlueprint.title: Castigator
droneBlueprint.desc: A Beam drone capable of causing devastating damage if shields are down, but is otherwise harmless.

droneBlueprint.name: SALT_MINER
droneBlueprint.title: Mining Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: A slow moving Beam drone that has an extremely long beam attack that can hit many rooms. Devastating if the enemy shields are offline.

droneBlueprint.name: SALT_MINER_CHAOS
droneBlueprint.title: Chaotic Mining Drone
droneBlueprint.desc:
A slow moving Beam drone that has an extremely long beam attack that can hit many rooms.
	Chaotic variant has a guaranteed breach chance and pierces all shields but uses more power.

droneBlueprint.title: Combat Drone Mk. I [Laser]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Laser] Basic Combat toggle Drone that can switch between a Laser and Beam weapon.

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_1_BEAM
droneBlueprint.title: Combat Drone Mk. I [Beam]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Beam] Basic Combat toggle Drone that can switch between a Laser and Beam weapon.

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_2_LASER
droneBlueprint.title: Combat Drone Mk. II [Laser]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Laser] Basic Combat toggle Drone that can switch between a Laser and Beam weapon. Moves faster than the MK I.

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_2_BEAM
droneBlueprint.title: Combat Drone Mk. II [Beam]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Beam] Basic Combat toggle Drone that can switch between a Laser and Beam weapon. Moves faster than the MK I.

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_CONSERVATIVE_LASER
droneBlueprint.title: Conservative Drone [Laser]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Laser] Slow moving toggle Drone that can switch between a Laser and Beam weapon and uses no power. Cannot be turned off but functions even if Drone Control is disabled.

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_CONSERVATIVE_BEAM
droneBlueprint.title: Conservative Drone [Beam]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Beam] Slow moving toggle Drone that can switch between a Laser and Beam weapon and uses no power. Cannot be turned off but functions even if Drone Control is disabled.

droneBlueprint.name: ASSAULT_PARTICLE
droneBlueprint.title: Assault Drone [Particle]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Particle] Diverse combat drone which can switch between Particle and Pierce modes for a range of applications in combat.

droneBlueprint.name: ASSAULT_PIERCE
droneBlueprint.title: Assault Drone [Pierce]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Pierce] Diverse combat drone which can switch between Particle and Pierce modes for a range of applications in combat.

droneBlueprint.name: HELLRAISER_FIRE
droneBlueprint.title: Hellraiser [Fire]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Fire] Powerful Beam toggle Drone that can switch between Fire and Anti-Hull modes.

droneBlueprint.name: HELLRAISER_HULL
droneBlueprint.title: Hellraiser [Hull]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Anti-Hull] Powerful Beam toggle Drone that can switch between Fire and Anti-Hull modes.

droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Fire] Powerful Beam toggle Drone that can switch between Fire and Anti-Hull modes.

droneBlueprint.name: HELLRAISER_HULL_PLAYER
droneBlueprint.title: Hellraiser† [Hull]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Anti-Hull] Powerful Beam toggle Drone that can switch between Fire and Anti-Hull modes.

droneBlueprint.name: PEST_RAD
droneBlueprint.title: Pestilence Drone [RAD]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Radiation] Specialized toggle Drone excellent for pestering enemy ships. Toggles between RAD or debuff mode. RAD mode does decent bio damage and creates breaches, while debuff mode applies stun and reduces health for 10s.

droneBlueprint.name: PEST_DEBUFF
droneBlueprint.title: Pestilence Drone [Debuff]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Debuff] Specialized toggle Drone excellent for pestering enemy ships. Toggles between RAD or debuff mode. RAD mode does decent bio damage and creates breaches, while debuff mode applies stun and reduces health for 10s.

droneBlueprint.name: FLAK_1_AMP2
droneBlueprint.title: Amp Flak
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT POWER: 2] Unlike your standard drone, this specialized amp drone can be configured to launch more than one projectile at the cost of more power.

droneBlueprint.name: FLAK_1_AMP3
droneBlueprint.title: Amp Flak
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT POWER: 3] Unlike your standard drone, this specialized amp drone can be configured to launch more than one projectile at the cost of more power.

droneBlueprint.name: REPAIR
droneBlueprint.title: Maintenance Drone
droneBlueprint.desc:
Controllable drone that repairs broken systems and puts out fires. Has low health but repairs quickly.
    
-50 HP, 2.5x repair speed
-1.2x movement speed

droneBlueprint.name: RECON_DEFENSE
droneBlueprint.title: Recon Drone [Defend]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Defensive] Controllable small airborne recon drone that explodes on death. Can be switched between defense and boarding modes. Takes 70% damage in boarding mode, and 30% in defensive.
    
-50 HP, 0.3x combat damage taken
-2.5x movement speed, rapidly destroys locked doors
-Reveals lifeforms and adjacent rooms
-Explodes on death, inflicting 30 crew damage, a 3 seconds stun, and 1 system damage. 30% chance to start fires.

droneBlueprint.name: RECON_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Recon Drone [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] Controllable small airborne recon drone that explodes on death. Can be switched between defense and boarding modes. Takes 70% damage in boarding mode, and 30% in defensive.
    
-50 HP, 0.7x combat damage taken
-2.5x movement speed, rapidly destroys locked doors
-Reveals lifeforms and adjacent rooms
-Explodes on death, inflicting 30 crew damage, a 3 seconds stun, and 1 system damage. 30% chance to start fires.

droneBlueprint.name: BATTLETOG_DEFEND
droneBlueprint.title: Battle Drone [Anti-Pers]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Anti-Personnel] Manually controlled personnel drone that can be toggled to act as either a Defensive Anti-Personnel or Boarding drone.
    
-175 HP, 1.1x combat damage
-0.8x movement speed

droneBlueprint.title: Battle Drone [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] Manually controlled personnel drone that can be toggled to act as either a Defensive Anti-Personnel or Boarding drone.
    
-175 HP, 1.1x combat damage
-0.8x movement speed

droneBlueprint.title: Battle Drone Mk. II [Anti-Pers]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Anti-Personnel] Manually controlled personnel drone that can be toggled to act as either a Defensive Anti-Personnel or Boarding drone. Has more health and does more damage than the MK I.
    
-200 HP, 1.5x combat damage
-0.5x movement speed

droneBlueprint.name: BATTLETOG2_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Battle Drone Mk. II [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:

droneBlueprint.name: DOCTOR_DEFENSE
droneBlueprint.title: Dr. Drone [Defend]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Defensive] Manually controlled support drone that heals friendly crew in the current room passively. Can be toggled between defensive or boarding modes.
    
-100 HP, 0.9x movement speed
-Heals nearby allies for 7hp/s

droneBlueprint.name: DOCTOR_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Dr. Drone [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] Manually controlled support drone that heals friendly crew in the current room passively. Can be toggled between defensive or boarding modes.
    
-100 HP, 0.9x movement speed
-Heals nearby allies for 7hp/s

-Provides power to occupied system
-Can man systems at lvl2 skill level

droneBlueprint.title: Hull Repair

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_SHIELD
droneBlueprint.title: Energized Overcharger
droneBlueprint.desc: A specialized Defense Drone which can charge additional Energy Shield points. Cannot exceed the maximum of 5 unless a stronger Energy Shield augment is present.

droneBlueprint.name: DRONE_SHIELD_POWERLESS
droneBlueprint.title: Overconserver
droneBlueprint.desc: A specialized Defense Drone which can charge additional Energy Shield points.  Cannot exceed the maximum of 5 unless a stronger Energy Shield augment is present. Modified to not use any power.

droneBlueprint.name: CONSTRUCTOR
droneBlueprint.title: Constructor Drone
droneBlueprint.desc:
A controllable and very agile drone which repairs systems at a decent speed, and shares their repair proficiency with nearby allies. More susceptible to fires than other crew drones.
    
-65 HP, 1.5x repair speed
-3x movement speed
-Allies in the same room repair 2.5x faster
-Takes regular fire damage

droneBlueprint.name: PRODUCER
droneBlueprint.title: Producer Drone
droneBlueprint.desc:
A controllable but lethargic drone that provides various support buffs and can man systems. More susceptible to fires than other crew drones.
    
-115 HP, 0.5x movement speed
-Allies in the same room repair 2.5x faster
-Can man systems at lvl2 skill level
-Refills oxygen, takes regular fire damage

droneBlueprint.name: GRAZIER_BATTLE
droneBlueprint.title: Grazier Drone [Anti-Pers]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Anti-Personnel] A controllable toggle drone with Anti-personnel and Boarding modes. Disperses two kinds of spores which weaken enemy crew and buff allied crew. More susceptible to fires than other crew drones.
    
-125 HP, 1.2x combat damage
-0.6x movement speed
-Friendly crew in the same room gain an additional 20% Max Health, repair speed, and heal speed
-Enemy crew in the same room lose 15% of their Max Health and move 25% slower
-Takes regular fire damage

droneBlueprint.name: GRAZIER_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Grazier Drone [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] A controllable toggle drone with Anti-personnel and Boarding modes. Disperses two kinds of spores which weaken enemy crew and buff allied crew. More susceptible to fires than other crew drones.
    
-125 HP, 1.2x combat damage
-0.6x movement speed
-Friendly crew in the same room gain an additional 20% Max Health, repair speed, and heal speed
-Enemy crew in the same room lose 15% of their Max Health and move 25% slower
-Takes regular fire damage

droneBlueprint.name: OMNI_DRONE
droneBlueprint.title: OmniDrone
droneBlueprint.desc:
The Arcadian OmniDrone - for when shields aren't enough. Arcadia, innovating tomorrow today.
	Reload: 900 MS

droneBlueprint.name: BUTLER_DEFENSE
droneBlueprint.title: Butler Drone [Anti-Pers]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Anti-Personnel] The Slugs rebuilt an Anti-Personnel drone to serve their own "special" purposes while still keeping its combat functionality.
    
-Periodic Ability: Blasts loud music, stunning hostiles for 8 seconds
-150 HP, 0.9x combat damage
-0.7x movement speed

droneBlueprint.name: BUTLER_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Butler Drone [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] The Slugs rebuilt an Anti-Personnel drone to serve their own "special" purposes while still keeping its combat functionality.
    
-Periodic Ability: Blasts loud music, stunning hostiles for 8 seconds
-150 HP, 0.9x combat damage
-0.7x movement speed

droneBlueprint.title: Divine Repair
droneBlueprint.desc:
The idol of the self-proclaimed 'True Prophet'.
    
-65 HP, 3x repair speed
-1.75x movement speed

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_RANDOM
droneBlueprint.title: The WonderDrone (tm)
droneBlueprint.desc: A very strange (and poorly made) smuggler drone that fires a random projectile every shot.

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_ENGINEER
droneBlueprint.title: Uplifted Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Specialized Beam drone that loses its toggle functionality to have a longer beam attack and stealth, allowing it to distract and avoid anti-drones.

droneBlueprint.name: COMBAT_BIO_BEAM
droneBlueprint.title: 'Fauchard' Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: Combat drone that repeatedly attacks with a small beam weapon that damages both crew and systems.

droneBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_COMBAT_LASER
droneBlueprint.title: Harbinger Drone Mk. I
droneBlueprint.desc: A drone that precedes all known drone tech. Appears to be equipped with Laser tech that does decent damage with extra system damage.

droneBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_COMBAT_LASER_2
droneBlueprint.title: Harbinger Drone Mk. II
droneBlueprint.desc: A drone that precedes all known drone tech. Appears to be equipped with Laser tech that does decent damage with extra system damage. Moves and shoots faster than Mark I.

droneBlueprint.name: ROYAL_COMBAT_LASER_2
droneBlueprint.title: Harbinger Drone Mk. II
droneBlueprint.desc: A drone that precedes all known drone tech. Appears to be equipped with Laser tech that does decent damage with extra system damage. Does more damage than its commoner counterpart.

droneBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_DEFENSE_1
droneBlueprint.title: Overwatcher
droneBlueprint.desc:
Ancient Defense technology that fires at any incoming projectiles.
	Reload: 100 MS

droneBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_DEFENSE_1_ENEMY
droneBlueprint.title: Overwatcher
droneBlueprint.desc:
Ancient Defense technology that fires at any incoming projectiles.
	Reload: 100 MS

droneBlueprint.name: ROYAL_DEFENSE_1
droneBlueprint.title: Overwatcher
droneBlueprint.desc:
Ancient Defense technology that fires at any incoming projectiles.
	Reload: 50 MS

droneBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_COMBAT_ION
droneBlueprint.title: Plasma Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: A drone that precedes all known drone tech. It is armed with plasma tech that does both ion and system damage.

droneBlueprint.name: ROYAL_COMBAT_ION
droneBlueprint.title: Plasma Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: A drone that precedes all known drone tech. It is armed with plasma tech that does both ion and system damage.

droneBlueprint.name: ANCIENT_COMBAT_MISSILE
droneBlueprint.title: Carnage Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: An ancient Missile Drone. Appears to be equipped with some sort of personal rift tech from which it obtains an endless supply of missiles.

droneBlueprint.name: ROYAL_COMBAT_MISSILE
droneBlueprint.title: Carnage Drone
droneBlueprint.desc: An ancient Missile Drone. Appears to be equipped with some sort of personal rift tech from which it obtains an endless supply of missiles.

droneBlueprint.name: MENDER
droneBlueprint.title: Mender
droneBlueprint.desc:
This controllable ancient crew drone can repair at insane speeds and provides other supporting benefits.
    
-110 HP, 4x repair speed, 1.5x movement speed
-Heals nearby crew for 1hp/s
-Inflicts a 9s stun when destroyed
-Reveals adjacent rooms

droneBlueprint.name: MENDERR
droneBlueprint.title: Royal Mender
droneBlueprint.desc:
This controllable ancient crew drone can repair at insane speeds and provides other supporting benefits.
    
-150 HP, 4.5x repair speed, 2x movement speed
-Heals nearby crew for 2hp/s
-Inflicts a 12s stun when destroyed
-Reveals adjacent rooms

droneBlueprint.name: DIRECTOR
droneBlueprint.title: Ancient Director
droneBlueprint.desc:
A useful ancient utility drone that can interface with systems and power them.
    
-120 HP, 1.5x movement speed
-Provides 4 power to occupied system
-Can man systems at lvl2 skill level
-Reveals adjacent rooms

droneBlueprint.name: ATOM_DEFEND
droneBlueprint.title: Atomizer [Anti-Pers]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Anti-Personnel] Powerful anti-crew drone that can be switched between defensive and boarding modes.
    
-60 HP, 2x movement speed
-2x combat damage, increased attack speed
-Drains oxygen from rooms
-Reveals adjacent rooms

droneBlueprint.name: ATOM_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Atomizer [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] Powerful anti-crew drone that can be switched between defensive and boarding modes.
    
-60 HP, 2x movement speed
-2x combat damage, increased attack speed
-Drains oxygen from rooms
-Reveals adjacent rooms

droneBlueprint.name: ROOMBA_DEFEND
droneBlueprint.title: Ancient Roomba [Anti-Pers]
droneBlueprint.desc: [CURRENT MODE: Anti-Personnel] This tiny little thing is claimed to be a weapon of war, yet to you it looks akin to old Earth cleaning technology. How strange.

droneBlueprint.title: Ancient Roomba [Boarding]

droneBlueprint.name: DEFENSE_TRINITY_MISSILE
droneBlueprint.title: Trinity Drone [M]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Anti-Missile] This special drone can toggle between three separate modes of defense, shooting down missiles, drones, or all projectiles.
	Reload: 300 MS

droneBlueprint.name: DEFENSE_TRINITY_DRONE
droneBlueprint.title: Trinity Drone [D]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Anti-Drone] This special drone can toggle between three separate modes of defense, shooting down missiles, drones, or all projectiles.
	Reload: 300 MS

droneBlueprint.name: DEFENSE_TRINITY_PROJECTILE
droneBlueprint.title: Trinity Drone [P]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Anti-Projectile] This special drone can toggle between three separate modes of defense, shooting down missiles, drones, or all projectiles.
	Reload: 300 MS

droneBlueprint.name: DEFENSE_TRINITY_CHAOS
droneBlueprint.title: Chaotic Trinity Drone
droneBlueprint.desc:
This special drone has multiple modes of defense; shooting down missiles, drones, or all projectiles.
	Chaotic variant does not toggle but has all modes enabled simultaneously.
	Reload: 300 MS

droneBlueprint.name: YINYANG_BATTLE
droneBlueprint.title: YinYang [Shipboard]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Shipboard] A toggle drone specialized for whichever task it is operating, but never both at the same time.
    
-125 HP, immune to fire, reveals adjacent rooms, 1.5x movement speed
-Shipboard mode: cannot fight, repairs at 2.5x speed and mans with max skills
-Boarding mode: 3x combat damage, 1.5x bonus ranged damage

droneBlueprint.name: YINYANG_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: YinYang [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] A toggle drone specialized for whichever task it is operating, but never both at the same time.
    
-125 HP, immune to fire, reveals adjacent rooms, 1.5x movement speed
-Shipboard mode: cannot fight, repairs at 2.5x speed and mans with max skills
-Boarding mode: 3x combat damage, 1.5x bonus ranged damage

droneBlueprint.name: YINYANG_BATTLE_CHAOS
droneBlueprint.title: Chaotic YinYang [Shipboard]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Shipboard] A toggle drone that can serve any task.
	Chaotic variant has the stats of all modes at once plus healing and provides power.
    
-125 HP, immune to fire, reveals adjacent rooms, 1.5x movement speed
-Repairs at 2.5x speed and mans with max skills
-3x combat damage, 1.5x bonus ranged damage
-Heals nearby allies for 3hp/s, provides power to occupied system

droneBlueprint.name: YINYANG_BOARDER_CHAOS
droneBlueprint.title: Chaotic YinYang [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] A toggle drone specialized for whichever task it is operating, but never both at the same time.
	Chaotic variant has the stats of all modes at once plus healing and provides power.
    
-125 HP, immune to fire, reveals adjacent rooms, 1.5x movement speed
-3x combat damage, 1.5x bonus ranged damage
-Heals nearby allies for 3hp/s

droneBlueprint.name: SURGEON_BATTLE
droneBlueprint.title: Surgeon [Shipboard]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Shipboard] A medical drone rewired by a murderous Rebel surgeon to be capable of combat.
    
-100 HP, 1.2x movement speed
-1.5x combat damage
-Heals nearby allies for 7hp/s

droneBlueprint.name: SURGEON_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Surgeon [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] A medical drone rewired by a murderous Rebel surgeon to be capable of combat.
    
-100 HP, 1.2x movement speed
-1.5x combat damage
-Heals nearby allies for 7hp/s

droneBlueprint.name: SURGEON_BATTLE_CHAOS
droneBlueprint.title: Chaotic Surgeon [Shipboard]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Shipboard] A medical drone rewired by a murderous Rebel surgeon.
	Chaotic variant heals allied crew nearly instantly but cannot fight on its own, and has less health.
    
-75 HP, 1.2x movement speed
-Heals nearby allies for 50hp/s

droneBlueprint.name: SURGEON_BOARDER_CHAOS
droneBlueprint.title: Chaotic Surgeon [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] A medical drone rewired by a murderous Rebel surgeon.
	Chaotic variant heals allied crew nearly instantly but cannot fight on its own, and has less health.
    
-75 HP, 1.2x movement speed
-Heals nearby allies for 50hp/s

droneBlueprint.name: FOREMAN_BATTLE
droneBlueprint.title: Foreman Drone [Anti-Pers]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Anti-Personnel] This mobile factory of Confederate design continuously manufactures Spore bombs against enemies. More susceptible to fires than other crew drones.
    
-Periodic Ability: Spawns a Spore bomb in the room, dealing 1 system damage and 30 damage to enemy crew. Continuously spawns bombs on the enemy ship, but on the player ship, only spawns bombs when an enemy is in the room
-140 HP, 0.5x movement speed
-Takes regular fire damage

droneBlueprint.name: FOREMAN_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Foreman Drone [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] This mobile factory of Confederate design continuously manufactures Spore bombs against enemies. More susceptible to fires than other crew drones.
    
-Periodic Ability: Spawns a Spore bomb in the room, dealing 1 system damage and 30 damage to enemy crew. Continuously spawns bombs on the enemy ship, but on the player ship, only spawns bombs when an enemy is in the room
-140 HP, 0.5x movement speed
-Takes regular fire damage

droneBlueprint.name: FOREMAN_BATTLE_CHAOS
droneBlueprint.title: Chaotic Foreman Drone [Anti-Pers]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Anti-Personnel] This mobile factory of Confederate design continuously manufactures Spore bombs against enemies. More susceptible to fires than other crew drones.
	Chaotic variant produces bombs much quicker, but takes 15 self damage for each bomb.
    
-Periodic Ability: Spawns a Spore bomb in the room, dealing 1 system damage and 30 damage to enemy crew. Continuously spawns bombs on the enemy ship, but on the player ship, only spawns bombs when an enemy is in the room
-140 HP, 0.5x movement speed
-Takes regular fire damage

droneBlueprint.name: FOREMAN_BOARDER_CHAOS
droneBlueprint.title: Chaotic Foreman Drone [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] This mobile factory of Confederate design continuously manufactures Spore bombs against enemies. More susceptible to fires than other crew drones.
	Chaotic variant produces bombs much quicker, but takes 15 self damage for each bomb.
    
-Periodic Ability: Spawns a Spore bomb in the room, dealing 1 system damage and 30 damage to enemy crew. Continuously spawns bombs on the enemy ship, but on the player ship, only spawns bombs when an enemy is in the room
-140 HP, 0.5x movement speed
-Takes regular fire damage

droneBlueprint.name: HOLODRONE_BATTLE
droneBlueprint.title: Holo-Drone [Assist]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Assist] A special drone with built-in hard-light projectors, which can create holographic assistants.
    
-Periodic Ability: Spawns an Osmian hologram which lasts for 25 seconds
-75 HP, 0.65x movement speed

droneBlueprint.name: HOLODRONE_BOARDER
droneBlueprint.title: Holo-Drone [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] A special drone with built-in hard-light projectors, which can create holographic assistants.

-Periodic Ability: Spawns an Osmian hologram which lasts for 25 seconds    
-75 HP, 0.65x movement speed

droneBlueprint.name: HOLODRONE_BATTLE_CHAOS
droneBlueprint.title: Chaotic Holo-Drone [Assist]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Assist] A special drone with built-in flesh projectors, which can print living assistants.
	Chaotic variant spawns a random permanent crew member at half health then instantly self-destructs.

-Spawns permanent crew and self destructs. Spawned crew will initially spawn at half health.

droneBlueprint.name: HOLODRONE_BOARDER_CHAOS
droneBlueprint.title: Chaotic Holo-Drone [Boarding]
droneBlueprint.desc:
[CURRENT MODE: Boarding] A special drone with built-in flesh projectors, which can print living assistants.
	Chaotic variant spawns a random permanent crew member at half health then instantly self-destructs.

-Spawns permanent crew and self destructs. Spawned crew will initially spawn at half health.

droneBlueprint.name: BOARDER_ION
droneBlueprint.title: Ion Intruder Drone
droneBlueprint.desc:
Manually controlled drone that breaches through the enemy hull and ionizes systems.

-Periodic Ability: inflicts 3 ion damage to a system and 6s stun to nearby enemies
-175 HP, 0.8x movement speed
